content:
#### HL Assurance 24 HOUR EMERGENCY HELPLINE (65) 6922 6009

##### Motor Emergency Assistance Services
Please note that the Services under Items (a) to (h) are purely on referral or arrangement basis. All costs and expenses incurred for the services listed below are to be borne by You.
(a) 24 Hours Emergency Towing Assistance
(b) 24 Hours Minor Roadside Repair Assistance
(c) Claims Procedure / Reporting Assistance
(d) Workshop Referral after Accident Assistance
(e) Service Centre Referral Assistance in Malaysia
(f) Car Replacement / Arrangement of Rental Vehicle Assistance Service
(g) Arrangement of Hotel Accommodation Assistance
(h) Emergency Message Transmission Assistance
questions: What is the contact number for HL Assurance's 24-hour emergency helpline?
What type of assistance does HL Assurance provide for motor emergencies?
Are the costs for emergency towing covered by HL Assurance?
What should I do if I need minor roadside repair assistance?
Can HL Assurance help me with the claims procedure after an accident?
Does HL Assurance offer workshop referral services after an accident?
Is there assistance available for finding service centers in Malaysia through HL Assurance?
How can I arrange for a rental vehicle through HL Assurance in case of a car accident?
What services are available for arranging hotel accommodations in emergencies?
Can HL Assurance assist in transmitting emergency messages?
